Kinopio Blog

Performance Up ~33%

New Stuff

Mar 20, 2024

Thanks to a

an avg of 33% faster interactions on things like selecting and moving/editing cards

went through the code behind the most common movements with a fine tooth comb, especially to try and improve safari perf.

continuing the work in posts/card-dragging-performance-up/ , to reduce or defer state ups that don't need to occur. and batching many updates into a single large one

boring out an engine, to squeeze that precious last horsepowers out of it. Potential for bigger improvements will need me to rethink my approach, i'm limited by vuex state management perf

The next Kinopio release will be another performance release. The scariest/oldest/largest card and connection logic is being pulled apart and rewritten to perform much faster. Technically, it's a huge change – but if everything goes well you won't even notice.

it's interesting how fast does new speed = new normal, if you've been using Kinopio for the last few days you might not have even noticed
